contentrichtext.text: '''Helena Dahlbäck''' (1960-2000) was a [[Sweden|Swedish]] author who wrote several children's books, for example ''My Sister Lotta and Me''. ''My Sister Lotta and Me'' was translated into [[English language|English]] by Rika Lessar in 1993 and published by Henry Holt & Co. (ISBN 0-8050-2558-8). It was illustrated by Charlotte Ramel, who also illustrated ''The Cake Book'', published by Sprall Publishing, [[Sweden]]. {{Authority control|VIAF=100973876}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Dahlback, Helena | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 1960 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = 2000 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Dahlback, Helena}} [[Category:1960 births]] [[Category:2000 deaths]] [[Category:Swedish children's writers]] [[Category:Swedish writers]] {{Sweden-writer-stub}}
